image.title: competition – Innovation & New Product Development | Frameplay | Ottawa, Canada | JTBD : Design Thinking : Workshops

item.title: Focus on Customer Problems, But Don’t Lose Sight of Other Market Forces.
item.dc:creator: Andrea Hill
item.description:
Jeff Bezos has famously cautioned against being too focused on competitors. But being customer- rather than competitor-focused doesn’t mean you should ignore everything else.

The post Focus on Customer Problems, But Don’t Lose Sight of Other Market Forces. appeared first on Innovation & New Product Development | Frameplay | Ottawa, Canada | JTBD : Design Thinking : Workshops.
